public class Bytecodes
extends Object
For assembling bytecodes from sequences.

Bytecodes(Sequence, JavaClass)

addAddressSlotHere(String)
Designates a location to be filled in with an address named name when name becomes known
addLineNumberHere(int)
Set the source line numbered lineno to include the next instruction to be added.
addNameHere(String)
Add a name to the list of known addresses, set to the next byte
addWideAddressSlotHere(String, int)
Like addAddressSlotHere, but refers to a 4-byte-wide location

createLocalVariableTableAttribute 
 public LocalVariableTableAttribute createLocalVariableTableAttribute(LocalVariableTableEntry lvt[])
Create a LocalVariableTableAttribute from a list of local variable table entries

getLineNums 
 public int[][] getLineNums()
Builds up the line number table based on the LineNumber instructions found in the sequence. The return value is an array of line number information. For each element, The first element is the start_pc for the line number, and the second is the source code line number that it points to.

labelLoc 
 public int labelLoc(String label)
Returns the location in the byte array of a label. Returns -1 if the name is not found.
